SELECT AppShopCategoryId, Sort, CategoryNo, PicNo, CreateDate from SWfsAppShopCategory WITH(NOLOCK) order by Sort

IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM SWfsAppShopCategory WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE Sort=@Sort) begin INSERT INTO SWfsAppShopCategory(Sort, CategoryNo, PicNo, CreateDate) VALUES(@Sort, @CategoryNo, @PicNo, @CreateDate) end else begin UPDATE SWfsAppShopCategory set CategoryNo=@CategoryNo, PicNo=@PicNo, CreateDate=@CreateDate WHERE Sort=@Sort end
SELECT OperatingPositionId, Sort, LinkUrl, PicNo, CreateDate from SWfsAppOperatingPosition WITH(NOLOCK) where Sort=@Sort
SELECT top 1 OperatingPositionId, Sort, LinkUrl, PicNo, CreateDate from SWfsAppOperatingPosition WITH(NOLOCK) order by Sort

WITH temp AS ( SELECT OperatingPositionId, Sort, LinkUrl, PicNo, CreateDate, ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( ORDER BY Sort ) AS row from SWfsAppOperatingPosition WITH(NOLOCK) ) SELECT OperatingPositionId, Sort, LinkUrl, PicNo, CreateDate FROM temp where row between (@pageIndex-1) * @pageSize + 1 and @pageIndex * @pageSize
SELECT count(0) from SWfsAppOperatingPosition WITH(NOLOCK)
SELECT max(Sort) from SWfsAppOperatingPosition WITH(NOLOCK)
delete from SWfsAppShopCategory where Sort in @Sorts
delete from SWfsAppOperatingPosition where OperatingPositionId in @Sorts

SELECT CategoryNo, CategoryCName as CategoryName, ParentCategoryNo as ParentNo, [Status] as VisibleState, SortId as Sort FROM dbo.SpfShopCategory WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE ParentCategoryNo=@ParentNo AND [Status]=1 ORDER BY SortId
SELECT TOP 1 * FROM dbo.SWfsNewSubject(nolock) WHERE SubjectNo=@SubjectNo
SELECT [AppSlterPicId] ,[Name] ,[Sort] ,[StartTime] ,[RefType] ,[RefContent] ,[PicNo] ,[AlterType] ,[CreateDate] FROM [SWfsAppAlterPic](nolock) WHERE AppSlterPicId = @AppSlterPicId
DELETE SWfsAppAlterPic WHERE AppSlterPicId = @AppSlterPicId

SELECT COUNT(0) FROM [SWfsAppAlterPic](nolock) WHERE 1 = 1 AND AlterType = @AlterType #if($Name != '') and Name = @Name #end #if($RefType != -1) and RefType = @RefType #end #if($Sort != -1) and Sort = @Sort #end #if($beginTime != '') AND @beginTime > StartTime #end #if($endTime != '') AND StartTime > @endTime #end

WITH temp AS ( SELECT [AppSlterPicId] ,[Name] ,[Sort] ,[StartTime] ,[RefType] ,[RefContent] ,[PicNo] ,[AlterType] ,[CreateDate] ,row_number() over(order by Sort asc , CreateDate desc) as row FROM [SWfsAppAlterPic](nolock) WHERE 1 = 1 AND AlterType = @AlterType #if($Name != '') and Name = @Name #end #if($RefType != -1) and RefType = @RefType #end #if($Sort != -1) and Sort = @Sort #end #if($beginTime != '') AND StartTime >= @beginTime #end #if($endTime != '') AND @endTime >= StartTime #end ) SELECT * FROM temp where row between (@pageIndex-1) * @pageSize + 1 and @pageIndex * @pageSize
select top 1 PicNo from SWfsAppAlterPic where AlterType=0 and getdate() >= starttime order by Sort asc ,starttime desc
select top 1 PicNo from SWfsAppAlterPic where AlterType=1 and getdate() >= starttime order by Sort asc, starttime desc
select BrandCnName from SpBrand where BrandNo=@BrandNo
select SubjectTemplateTopPicNo,SubjectPreTopPicNo,SubjectName,[Status],DatePre,DateBegin,DateEnd from SWfsNewSubject(nolock) where SubjectNo=@SubjectNo
select AppSlterPicId from SWfsAppAlterPic(nolock) where StartTime=@StartTime and Sort=@Sort
update SWfsAppOperatingPosition set Sort=@Sort where OperatingPositionId=@OperatingPositionId
